name: Hooked (CCeriseGD)
description:
You have appeared in some place in space, and your only tool is your trusty grappling hook. Will you be able to find an exit?

How to play
A and D to move
W to jump

H to hook

WASD to aim the hook

Made in around 8 days for LÖVE jam 2023.
Art made with Aseprite, sounds made with Chiptone.
I also used bump.lua for collisions, and love.js for the web version.
I'm pretty happy with how it came out, and I might make a full game out of this at some point.
